input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_ARS_System
XML Document - This is an XML document that contains the exported compliance data.
Run ID of the compliance job to be analysed.
Name of the compliance job in question.
Parent group of the compliance job in question.

output.from: to email address list for approval email

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Name:", '${compliance job name}', " JobParentGroup:", '${compliance job parent group}', " Host:", '${hostname}', " RunIndex:", '${compliance job run index}', " JobType:", '${compliance job type}')
substring(concat(., ": Compliance Discrepancy:${compliance job name}:${compliance job parent group}:${compliance job run index}"), 1, 99)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet:
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:apply-templates select="inconsistent-target/compliance-job-results" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> =========================</xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="compliance-job-results"> <xsl:variable name="prev" select=" position()-1" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$prev=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Template: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="template/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">
+++++++++++++++++++++++++
Rule Group: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="rule-group/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:call-template name="display-rule"> <xsl:with-param name="rule" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="template/text() != /inconsistent-target/compliance-job-results[$prev]/template/text()"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">
=========================
Template: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="template/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">
+++++++++++++++++++++++++
Rule Group: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="rule-group/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:call-template name="display-rule"> <xsl:with-param name="rule" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="rule-group/text() != /inconsistent-target/compliance-job-results[$prev]/rule-group/text()"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">
+++++++++++++++++++++++++
Rule Group: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="rule-group/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:call-template name="display-rule"> <xsl:with-param name="rule" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:call-template name="display-rule"> <xsl:with-param name="rule" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="display-rule"> <xsl:param name="rule" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">
Rule: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$rule/rule/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> - Ref #: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$rule/rule-ref-number/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> - Result: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$rule/result/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> Definition: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$rule/rule-definition/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> Mismatch Conditions: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$rule/mismatch-conditions/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Incident management disabled. Create incident skipped.
Failed to create incident. Recieved following error -
Failed to update workinfo for incident
Change management disabled. Create change skipped.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:variable name="rules"> <xsl:for-each select="//rule"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(text(), ',')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:variable> <xsl:value-of select="substring($rules, 1, string-length($rules) - 1)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Pre-Approved:${pre approved change} ", concat("IncidentNumber:${incident number} Name:", '${compliance job name}', " JobParentGroup:", '${compliance job parent group}', " Host:", '${hostname}', " RunIndex:", '${compliance job run index}', " JobType:", '${compliance job type}', " InconsistentRules:", .))

input.value: Failed to create change. Recieved following error -
Failed to update workinfo for change
Incident management disabled. Change incident association skipped.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status-messages> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> </status-messages> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.value: CMDB not enabled in configuration. Skipping CI associations

input.value: CMDB not enabled in configuration. Skipping CI associations.

xpath-expression.xpath: concat('Configuration item not found for ', ., '. Unable to relate incident to Configuration Item.')

output.value: Configuration item not found in CMDB.

input.value: Configuration item not found in CMDB.
Failed to associate incident with CI.
Failed to associate change with CI.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status-messages> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> </status-messages> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)=''"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">NO_INCIDENT</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="string(.)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: In order to trigger the remediation an email needs to be sent to
Also make sure that IMAP adapter is enabled on the grid and monitoring incoming email messages for the following account -
. Otherwise remediation workflow will not be triggered.
No compliance failure(s) found. No further action required.

documentation.description: This workflow opens the incident and change for each inconsistent target found by the compliance job.
